title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 567.6 - Traffic control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 567.6 - Traffic control

State Regulations
(a) 15 MPH
is established as the maximum speed at which vehicles may proceed on or along
all roadways on the grounds of SUNY Potsdam, Village of Potsdam, St. Lawrence

County, except on the following roadways: (1)

Canton Drive between Pierrepont Avenue and Ogdensburg Drive. (2)

Ogdensburg Drive between Canton Drive and

Barrington Drive. (3)

Barrington

Drive between Ogdensburg Drive and Outer Main Street. (b) 25 MPH is established as the maximum
speed limit at which vehicles may proceed on or along the following roadways on
the grounds of the SUNY Potsdam, Village of Potsdam, St. Lawrence County: (1)

Canton Drive between Pierrepont Avenue
and Ogdensburg Drive. (2)

Ogdensburg Drive between Canton Drive and Barrington Drive. (3)

Barrington Drive between Ogdensburg Drive
and Outer Main Street. (c) Standing is prohibited on or along either
side of all roadways on the grounds of SUNY Potsdam, Village of Potsdam, St. Lawrence County. (d) Stop
intersections. The following intersections on the grounds of SUNY Potsdam, Village of Potsdam, St. Lawrence County, are designated as stop intersections
as indicated below: Intersection of Sign Facing

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
